name: Colonists
description:
A game of management and conquest, you start with a small colony and expand it into an empire. Build structures to increase your production, build ships enabling you to conquer surrounding colonies.I hope you will enjoy the game, it is pretty much self-explanatory (grow and conquer). I would like to point out that you will not be able to finish this game in a few hours, it should take much longer than that. When you are short of materials, leave it running in the task-bar for a few hours, your resources will accumulate and you should be able to continue your expansion.

Game will auto-save every 30min and when exiting, it will also auto-load when opening.
